name: SupportArturAndTethys
_source: speak;Tethys;Yes, that's right.|Come here for a moment.|I won't bite.
speak;Artur;How may I help you, my lady?
speak;Tethys;Would you spin yourself around right there?
speak;Tethys;Hm...|Not bad.|Not bad at all.|You have a graceful form.|And you're quite beautiful.|It'd be a waste to let you stay a simple clergyman.
speak;Tethys;Yes, you have a lovely face.|Say...|Would you like to dance with me?|I think you have the potential.|I could use a partner.|When this war ends, I think it should be you.
speak;Artur;I...don't know about that.|Dancing probably isn't my thing.
speak;Tethys;You never know until you try.|Anyway, from what I can see, I think you've got what it takes.|Trust me.|There's no future in this church business.|Be a dancer.
speak;Artur;I'm afraid I have to disagree.|I feel this is my calling, you see.|Er...|If that's all you wanted, would you excuse me?
speak;Tethys;Oh, oh.|Yes, fine.|Only...|What's your name, child?
speak;Tethys;That's right.|I'll see you later, child.|Think about what I told you about becoming a dancer, won't you?
speak;Artur;I really don't think it's for me...
speak;Tethys;Do you remember the dance steps I showed you the other day, child?|No?|I'll show them to you again.|Pay attention, as you'll be going next.
speak;Artur;Tethys, we're in the middle of a battle.|Can't this wait until later?
speak;Tethys;My, aren't we confident!|No, we can't have that.|We have to practice.|I refuse to have a partner who's too lazy to practice daily.
speak;Artur;No, you're not following me.|I'm not your partner.|I don't want to-|Would you please stop calling me “child” in front of everyone!
speak;Tethys;What's wrong with looking young?|After all, you have such lovely skin.|May I...touch your cheeks?
speak;Artur;Oh...|Ah, normally, people wait for an answer before they start...er...|well, touching me.|Um...|Would you please stop?
speak;Tethys;Amazing!|It's like velvet to the touch!|You have such smooth skin!
speak;Artur;I...|I don't have any secrets!|Oh...|You meant my skin.|Well, I just rub manon leaves on after I wash.

speak;Tethys;Manon leaves?|Those scratchy things?|I always thought they would just leave a rash.|Hm.|Maybe I should try...|I'll see you later, child.|I'll be checking up on your progress, so be sure to practice those steps.
speak;Artur;But I don't want to be a dancer...|I...|*Sigh*...
speak;Tethys;Well, look who's come to see me!|I'm glad to see you showing some initiative.|You must be practicing a lot, hm?|Well, show me what you've got!
speak;Artur;Please!|I have a name!|I am not a child!|My name is Artur!|And...I really must protest about becoming a dancer.|I have no interest in learning how to dance, do you understand?
speak;Tethys;I'm glad you're here, because I have something I wanted to tell you.
speak;Tethys;I scrubbed my face with manon leaves, just like you said, but look...|I got a rash, just like I thought I would.|Look here, on my cheek.
speak;Artur;I'm not sure this is the right time.|We're in the middle of a battle.
speak;Tethys;We'll be fine.|It'll only take a second.|We'll be done in a flash.
speak;Tethys;Come on, you're not looking right.|Get closer.|Closer...|More.|Look right around here...|See?|It's red, isn't it?
speak;Artur;...A little, but...it's not that bad.
speak;Artur;I-if you turn your head so suddenly like that...your face is...|It's so close to my...
speak;Tethys;Hm mm mm.|You're blushing.|Are you all right, child?
speak;Artur;I-I'm fine, but...|Every time you're around, my heart...
speak;Tethys;To tell you the truth, you look just like my first love.
speak;Tethys;But he moved, and I never saw him again.|Oh, it brings back such memories...|He and I couldn't have been much older than, say, ten.
speak;Artur;...Are you telling me I look like a ten-year-old child?
speak;Tethys;Yep.|Those sparkling eyes are totally him.
speak;Artur;I see...|I know someone who looks like you, too.
speak;Artur;...My mother.|She called me “child” when I was little, just like you do now.|I used to like that then, but now that I'm older...
speak;Tethys;...Oh...|A bit of a mama's boy, are you, Artur?
speak;Tethys;Tee-hee...|Very well. I shall mother you.|Call me “mom,” child.
speak;Artur;Er...|I...|I'm not sure about this.|Besides, I used to call her “mother,” not “mom,” so...

speak;Tethys;I'm only kidding.|I just love teasing you.|However, I am serious about you becoming a dancer.|Your good looks and graceful movement tell me you have the talent...|You would make a fine partner.|Just think about it, will you?
speak;Artur;Oh, I forgot-that's what I wanted to talk to you about.|I don't want to-
speak;Artur;...Er, excuse me.|Tethys, would you wait up for me!?
